issue.title: Error handling
issue.body: The bot crashed several times during Swamphacks so we just need to start catching exceptions...

issue.title: Analyze messages from SwampHacks to tweak commands
Default mentors to not available
issue.body: Probably the quickest enhancement. Default mentors array to empty and allow mentors to set themselves as active with `.mentor active`.

issue.title: Use API instead of config file
issue.body: Bot works great until it crashes. Boo :-1:

issue.title: Admin adding mentors via Slack does not work
issue.body: Just need to add the new admins to the `mentors` array.
